If a loan is all I got then I'm up for it.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
Here's some really good news; apparently the nuclear deal with Iran is going to go forward.

Before someone goes, "but they're arming fighters in Yemen" or such; yes I am aware of this, but the reason why this is going to be a big deal in history books is that yes I am aware that the treaty is probably going to be crappy, yes I am aware that it's not going to be sunshine and rainbows but rather the reason why I'm excited is that this'll start calming things down in the middle east.

Why do I think this'll calm things down?  Cause a lot of the wars in the middle east are proxy wars.  If you have the countries responsible for the proxy wars under your thumb then shit's going to calm down eventually.  I'm totally aware that both sides are complete assholes responsible for war crimes and shit, but if you have both of them financially dependant on you then they're not going to be so eager to start shit if it means potentially losing your money.

Do I think all wars in the middle east will immediately end and everyone will be singing and holding hands while skipping through fields of flowers?  No.
Do I think the current wars will immediately end?  No.

Rather what I think will happen in the next decade is that there won't be more than one or two new wars and that over the next decade the current wars will start winding down... Except for Syria; Syria is fucked.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551ebd536368727916470600#post_551ebd536368727916470600

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551ec081636872781b051700#post_551ec081636872781b051700
Do I think there will ever be a day where there will never ever be another war until the heat death of the universe?  No; sure the world is becoming more peaceful and such but there will always be at least one or two wars going on in the world.

The good thing is that the number of deaths due to war is going down; in 1940 it was 1/1000 people in the general populace died due to war; now it's 1/100000


What I think will happen in the long run:
2015: 11 active wars
2025: 6 active wars
2035: 4 active wars; 50000 deaths
2050: 2 active wars; 10000 deaths
2070: 1 active war; 1000 deaths
2071: 0 active wars
2072: 1 active war; 1000 deaths
2073: 0 active wars
2074: 1 active war; 1000 deaths
2100: 0 active wars
2101: 1 active war; 1000 deaths
2102: 0 active wars
2103: 1 active war; 1000 deaths
.... etc you get the point.
